definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
Malan military base and atomic test site in Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture 巴音郭楞蒙古自治州[Ba1 yin1 guo1 leng2 Meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang
Al-Qaeda/same as 基地組織|基地组织

Bai4 ke1 nu3 er3 Hang2 tian1 Fa1 she4 Ji1 di4
containing_words.word: 拜科努爾航天發射基地

sentences.english: Steven Kennard:What are the requirements for ABP choosing international partners?
sentences.chinese: 總部基地在全球選擇合作伙伴都有哪些要求？

sentences.english: An edible wild herbs production processing base is proposed to be constructed.
sentences.chinese: 擬建山野菜生產加工基地，產品銷往國內外。

sentences.english: A Soviet naval base near Murmansk helped the Nazi attack on Norway.
sentences.chinese: 蘇聯摩爾曼斯克一處海軍基地協助納粹攻擊挪威。

sentences.english: Hexi corridor was named one of the commodity grain base in China and granary bam of Gansu province.
sentences.chinese: 河西走廊被譽爲甘肅的糧倉和全國的商品糧基地之一。

sentences.english: New Mother Town is expected to help ABP create a homelike atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 新母城爲總部基地營造家一般的發展氛圍。

sentences.english: Lianyungang has gradually become the research base of the continental bridge economy throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 連雲港市已經逐步成爲全國的陸橋經濟研究基地。

sentences.english: Covenant base ship and fleet are here en masse guarding Delta Halo.
sentences.chinese: 聖約人的基地飛船和艦隊都在這裏守衛德爾塔光暈。

sentences.english: New facilities will include the Universiade City and a marine sports base.
sentences.chinese: 需要新建的包括大學生體育城以及海上運動基地。

sentences.english: I still have them at Cloverleaf's home base.
sentences.chinese: 在立體式的家鄉的基地我仍然有它們。

sentences.english: Mingxia Dong now houses a government project researching Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 明霞洞現在是政府的一箇中醫藥項目研究基地。

sentences.english: A Burmese Army base exists in Sang Hka and the 6th battalion of the KIA is situated opposite it.
sentences.chinese: 緬軍桑卡基地和克欽獨立軍第六營據點對面。

sentences.english: That small town is the last far-flung outpost of our country.
sentences.chinese: 那個小城鎮是我們國家一個遙遠的前哨基地。

sentences.english: An explosion was also reported at a military base in the Tajura region east of Tripoli.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸還報告了在的黎波里以東塔朱拉地區的軍事基地。

sentences.english: South Korea will not confirm the missile-site report.
sentences.chinese: 韓國沒有證實有關導彈基地的報道。

sentences.english: Used in naval base of the seven military packaging equipment.
sentences.chinese: 運用於海軍七大基地之器械包裝。

sentences.english: It also serves as one of the training bases for China`s national skiing team.
sentences.chinese: 同時，它也是中國國家滑雪隊的訓練基地之一。

definition: site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
stronghold/defended military base/base for operations/strategic point/foothold/(market) presence
